csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"><info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated></info><macro name="issued-date">
    <group prefix="[" suffix="]">
    <text variable="title"/>
    <choose>
      <if type="book">
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year" form="long"/>
        </date>
      </if>
      <else>
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year" form="long" suffix="-"/>
          <date-part name="month" form="numeric" suffix="-"/>
          <date-part name="day" form="numeric"/>
        </date>
      </else>
    </choose>
    </group></macro><citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="bogus"/>
    </layout></citation><bibliography>
    <sort>
      <key macro="issued-date" sort="ascending"/>
    </sort>
    <layout>
      <text variable="title" />
    </layout></bibliography></style>
